item.description:
There does not appear to be as much interest in SVG as I thought there might be and I am not necessarily committed to that topic. There are a number of subjects that can be discussed. Here are a few that I could moderate or present on. Let me know what interests you by answering the poll below. If the poll is not visible to you, please go to:
http://polldaddy.com/poll/7030821/

Which topic below interest you the most for the next WordPress Meetup?

Thank you for your input. This is what I should have done in the first place. And as always, if you want to present in the future, send me, Ed Gray, a message.

This meetup is for developers, designers, end-users and site owners.

Knectar Design's offices are on the third floor in Suite 354. Follow the WordPress Meetup signs.

Refreshments of the beer and pizza kind will be offered. A small donation of $3-5 is suggested to help cover expenses.

Notes from last month's meetup can be found at:
http://www.valleywp.org/what-you-missed-at-the-march-2013-meetup/

Â

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: April 2013 Valley WordPress Meetup
